svg.text: Modern Report Layout with Quarto Document Creation Methods

g.text: Customer acquisition cost decreased by 18% while maintaining
quality leads, resulting in improved ROI across all channels.
Increase investment in digital marketing channels by 25%
Expand customer success team to maintain NPS above 70
Implement automated reporting for real-time insights
Focus on retention strategies for high-value segments
A. Quarto source code | B. Raw data | C. Code chunks | D. Bibliography
Reproducible â€¢ Multi-format â€¢ Open Source
â€¢ Markdown + code chunks (R, Python, Julia, Observable)
â€¢ Multiple outputs: HTML, PDF, Word, RevealJS, ePub
â€¢ Code execution engines: knitr (R), Jupyter (Python)
â€¢ Code chunk options: cache, warnings, figure sizing
â€¢ Inline code & dynamic values in text
â€¢ Interactive widgets: htmlwidgets, plotly, Observable
â€¢ Environment management: renv, conda, Docker
â€¢ Quarto Pub: One-click cloud publishing
â€¢ GitHub Pages: Integrated Git workflow
â€¢ Netlify/Vercel: Automatic deployment from Git
â€¢ Version control: Git integration, diff-friendly
â€¢ CI/CD: GitHub Actions automated rendering
â€¢ Filters & shortcodes for content automation
â€¢ Flexible layouts & page design systems
â€¢ LaTeX integration for scientific publishing
